main.title: Main
main.description: Please ensure that you have configured your RetroNAS user, group and top level directory in the Global configuration section before installing any tools. Changing any of these options will require tools to be reinstalled.||Current RetroNAS settings| User: "${OLDRNUSER}"| Group: "${OLDRNGROUP}"| Directory: "${OLDRNPATH}"| Git Branch: "${OLDRNBRANCH}"|

items.title: Exit
items.description: So long and thanks for all the bits

advanced.title: Advanced
advanced.description: Please select a tool to install

config.title: Configuration
config.description: Please select a configuration||Current RetroNAS settings| User: "${OLDRNUSER}"| Group: "${OLDRNGROUP}"| Directory: "${OLDRNPATH}"| Git Branch: "${OLDRNBRANCH}"|

install.title: Install
install.description: Please select an option to install

items.title: Samba
items.description: LANMan, NTLMv1/v2, NetBIOS, SMB1/2/3, CIFS file sharing

items.title: Netatalk3
items.description: Apple AFP file sharing TCP/IP only (OSX10.2+)

items.title: EtherDFS
items.description: lightweight layer 2 network file sharing for DOS

items.title: ProFTPd
items.description: FTP, File Transfer Protocol file sharing

items.title: tftpd-hpa
items.description: TFTP, Trivial File Transfer Protocol file sharing

items.title: OpenSSH
items.description: SSH/SFTP/SCP Secure Shell command line and file transfer

items.title: WebOne
items.description: HTTP 1.x proxy for a HTTP 2.x world

items.title: megatools
items.description: command line client application for Mega

experimental.title: EXPERIMENTAL
experimental.description: WARNING these tools are very EXPERIMENTAL and could break your system or destroy your data!||Do not use these unless you are comfortable with losing everthing

items.title: uCON64
items.description: Multipurpose Swiss Army Knife Backup/Copier tool

items.title: cue2pops
items.description: Convert PS1 images for use with POPS

services.title: Services
services.description: Please select a service to check

hdparm.title: hdparm
hdparm.description: WARNING: These changes are irreversable, USE AT YOUR OWN RISK||Try in ORDER:|APM -\> Standby -\> Custom service \!\!LAST RESORT\!\! \<-||The custom service reads a random sector from the drive at random intervals every 3-5m, this should be enough to keep the drive up and reduce any impact on the drive.

items.title: Install
items.description: Install the PS4 Homebrew Store CDN

xlinkkai.title: XLink Kai
xlinkkai.description: XLink Kai online gaming service for LAN based game modes||WARNING: XLink Kai works by capturing and inspecting network traffic, we recommend you isolate devices running XLink from your main net

tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Please select an option to install

items.title: GOG
items.description: Download your GOG installers and extras

update.title: Update
update.description: Please select a tool to update

items.title: Extra Dir(s)
items.description: Update extra RetroNAS directories (bios, saves etc)

items.title: History
items.description: Update History for GNU/Linux Operating System packages

items.title: Branch
items.description: Manage the active GIT branch, (test new features, etc)

update-user.title: Update User
update-user.description: Please enter the username for all RetroNAS services to run as||This will normally default to "pi" on Raspberry Pi OS Install||It is recommended you leave it as default unless you know what you are doing.

update-user-confirm.title: Confirm User
update-user-confirm.description: Do you want to save this setting?|New RetroNAS user: "${NEWVALUE}"

update-group.title: Update Group
update-group.description: Please enter the group for all RetroNAS services to run as||This will normally default to "pi" on Raspberry Pi OS Install||It is recommended you leave it as default unless you know what you are doing.

update-group-confirm.title: Confirm Group
update-group-confirm.description: Do you want to save this setting?|New RetroNAS group: "${NEWVALUE}"

update-password.title: Update Password
update-password.description: If you are having problems with CIFS/SMB/Appletalk shares, you can reset their password here, this will also update your user password||Passwords entered here will be echoed to the backend processes||Use the up/down arrows to navigate form fields

set-top-level-dir.title: Set Top Level Directory
set-top-level-dir.description: Please type in the RetroNAS top level directory

set-top-level-dir-confirm.title: Confirm EtherDFS NIC
set-top-level-dir-confirm.description: Do you want to save this setting?|New RetroNAS top level directory: "${NEWVALUE}"

set-etherdfs-nic.title: Set EtherDFS NIC
set-etherdfs-nic.description: Please enter the interface name for EtherDFS to bind to.||Normally this is something like eth0 for wired Ethernet.||If EtherDFS is installed, you will need to re-run the installer to apply the change.

set-etherdfs-nic-confirm.title: Confirm EtherDFS NIC
set-etherdfs-nic-confirm.description: Do you want to save this setting?|New EtherDFS interface: "${NEWVALUE}"

tcpser-edit.title: tcpser Modem Config
tcpser-edit.description: Config path: "${TCPSER_CONFIG_PATH}"||Legend:|- VIRTUAL: VICE RS232 mode|- PHYSICAL: for USB/Real serial ports||Attention: A Device is considered unique by listen port. Configurations are not read in from existing. This port config will be overwritten on close.

items.title: Init String
items.description: Hayes Modem Init String (without leading A)

romimport.title: ROM Import Tool
romimport.description: This uses Frederic Mahe's Python scripts and Smokemonster's SMDB databases to import ROMs.||ROMs are matched by checksum, renamed and placed into the matching directory structure via space-saving hard links.||Existing ROMs will never be overwritten.||If ROMs fail to import, it means you have a ROM with a checksum not in the database, or the system type is not yet added.||Place ROMs in the import directory above use SMB/CIFS/AFP/FTP/SCP/SFTP/whatever first.||Do you wish to proceed?

gogrepo.title: GOG
gogrepo.description: Current OS: "${OLDGOGOS}"||WARNING: There is currently known issues with this tool,|see https://github.com/eddie3/gogrepo/issues/63||Please choose a task

items.description: Synchronise games list & download/update all games

gogrepo-setupos.title: GOG configure OS
gogrepo-setupos.description: Current Operating Systems: ${OLDGOGOS}||Please set the Operating System\(s\) you would like to download GOG games for.

gogrepo-gamechooser.title: GOG game chooser
gogrepo-gamechooser.description: Please choose a game||If your game has not appeared, please synchronise your games list

adtpro.title: adtpro
adtpro.description: ADTPro transfers data \(physical disks and/or disk images\) between Apple II-era computers and RetroNAS||We launch this service in headless localhost mode \(serial over IP\), you can use VNC to access the gui with the full feature set||Note: Requires a VNC client connected to retronas:60000

items.title: Edit
items.description: Change the Ethenet net listen port

adtpro_localhost.title: adtpro
adtpro_localhost.description: Please select an option, note in this mode ADTPro is a client
